-- Hoogle documentation, generated by Haddock
-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/

@package main

module Haddock

-- | BUG 1: bug1 will not have any documentation
class Bug1 a
bug1 :: Bug1 a => Integer -> a
data (:**:) a b

-- | BUG 2: The :**: is prefix without brackets
Bug2 :: :**: a b
data Bug3

-- | FIXED 3 (Haddock 2.8): This Int gets two !!'s before it
Bug3 :: {-# UNPACK #-} !Int -> Bug3

-- | BUG 4: The kind signature gets misplaced
class Bug4 m :: (* -> *)

-- | BUG 5: The instance below has [incoherent] on it
bug5 :: ()
instance [incoherent] Num ()
